sentences.en: A form of threatened egotism seems to be a factor in many suicides.
sentences.cn: 许多自杀案例中,案主的自尊受到某种形式的威胁似乎是个因素.

sentences.en: Cunning egotism: if I cannot brag of knowing something, then I brag of not knowing it; at any rate, brag.
sentences.cn: 狡猾的自吹自擂: 倘使我不能自夸知道一些事情, 那我就自夸毫不知情; 总之, 自吹自擂就是了.

sentences.en: Egotism : The art of seeing in yourself what others cannot see.
sentences.cn: 自负:用与他人不同的方式来看待自己的艺术.

sentences.en: Egotism is the anesthetic that dulls the pain of stupidity.
sentences.cn: 自负是为了麻痹因为愚蠢带来痛楚的麻醉剂.

sentences.en: Egotism produces disrespectful attitudes toward others.
sentences.cn: 自我中心会产生对别人不尊重的态度.

sentences.en: Even as late as the 19th century, the poet Samuel Coleridge, in one of his essays on Shakespeare, could describe the villain Iago as “the very alcohol of egotism.”
sentences.cn: 就在十九世纪，诗人萨缪尔·柯勒律治 (Samuel Coleridge) 在他论述莎士比亚的一篇短文中还将反面角色伊阿古描述为“the very alcohol of egotism” (自尊自大的化身)。

sentences.en: He was helpless under the reign of his egotism.
sentences.cn: 他在自我意识的支配下感觉无助.

sentences.en: He was kindly and good - natured for all his egotism.
sentences.cn: 他尽管一心想着自己,但是他和气,善良,心眼好.

sentences.en: Love is an egotism of two.
sentences.cn: 人生是花朵,爱情是花蜜.

sentences.en: Of all things , banish the egotism out of your conversation.
sentences.cn: 谈话时, 首先要排除以自我为中心.

sentences.en: The improper performances rise from selfish egotism, or what he called "Me-ism", said Roberts. Such thinking leads people to break rules.
sentences.cn: 罗伯茨表示，种种不良行为很多时候是基于一种狭隘的自我为中心的意识，他用了一个词"Me-ism"来形容，正是这种凡事都先想到"我"的思维方式，造成了人们不顾秩序，不守规章。

sentences.en: Thus, the formula of threatened egotism combines something about the person with something about the situation.
sentences.cn: 因此, [威胁的自尊]条暴力公式,其实是事主的某些面相与情境的某些面相结合的结果.

sentences.en: Tina has a glandular aversion to Tom's egotism.
sentences.cn: 缇娜对于汤姆的唯我主义有本能的厌恶.

sentences.en: Vanity, egotism, and pride – they all hide a subtle unhappiness, a cleverly disguised animosity.
sentences.cn: 虚荣 、 自负 、 骄傲,这些都暗含着一种微妙的不快, 一种巧妙伪装的敌意.

sentences.en: What Jeanie least liked in the tone of the letter was a smothered degree of egotism.
sentences.cn: 珍妮最不高兴的是信中隐约可见的唯我独尊的口吻.

words.tran_cn: 自我本位的；自负的；自高自大的
任性的；自我本位的；傲慢自尊的

trans.tran_en: the belief that you are much better or more important than other people
